text: aur (ai rasool) jo log subah va shaam apane paravaradigaar se usakee khushanoodee kee tamanna mein duoe moga karate hain- unako apane paas se na dhutkaaro-na unake (hisaab kitaab kee) javaab dehee kuchh unake zimme hai taaki tum unhen (is khyaal se) dhutkaar batao to tum zaalim (ke shumaar) mein ho jaoge
